statements: SELECT * FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, performance FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT user_id, progress, performance FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(progress) AS avg_progress FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, progress, performance FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(progress) as total_progress, AVG(performance) as avg_performance FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_progress > 100;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE performance BETWEEN 80 AND 90 ORDER BY user_id, performance DESC;
SELECT MAX(progress) as max_progress, MIN(progress) as min_progress FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, progress, performance FROM user_progress WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, progress_percent, last_updated FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT progress_percent, user_id, last_updated FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percent > 50;
SELECT user_id, last_updated, progress_percent FROM user_progress ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_performance FROM user_performance GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, performance_score, date_recorded FROM user_performance WHERE date_recorded = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, progress_percent, last_updated FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, performance_score, date_recorded FROM user_performance WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT user_id, progress_percent, last_updated FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percent < 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT user_id, progress_percent, last_updated FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percent BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(progress_percent) AS total_progress FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_progress > 100;
SELECT user_id, app_id, progress FROM user_progress;
SELECT * FROM user_performance WHERE completion_status='Completed';
SELECT user_id, score FROM user_performance ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT app_name, release_date FROM app_info WHERE app_id=1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM app_info;
SELECT user_id, app_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT app_id, app_name FROM app_info ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT user_id, score, completion_status FROM user_performance WHERE app_id = 2
SELECT app_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM user_performance GROUP BY app_id
SELECT app_id, app_name, release_date FROM app_info WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM UserProgress;
SELECT user_id, performance FROM UserPerformance WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_duration FROM ARTrainingLessons ORDER BY lesson_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, lesson_id, completed FROM LessonProgress WHERE completed = true;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM UserProgress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM UserProgress
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_duration FROM ARTrainingLessons ORDER BY lesson_duration DESC
SELECT user_id, progress FROM UserProgress WHERE progress > 0.5
SELECT * FROM LessonProgress WHERE completed = TRUE
SELECT UserProgress.user_id, UserProgress.progress, LessonProgress.completed FROM UserProgress JOIN LessonProgress ON UserProgress.user_id = LessonProgress.user_id
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT module_name FROM Modules WHERE id = 2;
SELECT username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, module_id, progress FROM UserProgress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.role_name FROM Users u INNER JOIN Roles r ON u.role = r.id;
SELECT up.user_id, m.module_name, up.progress FROM UserProgress up INNER JOIN Modules m ON up.module_id = m.id ORDER BY up.progress DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(up.module_id) AS total_modules FROM Users u LEFT JOIN UserProgress up ON u.id = up.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, (up.accuracy * 100) AS accuracy_percentage FROM UserPerformance up INNER JOIN Users u ON up.user_id = u.id WHERE up.accuracy >= 0.8;
